Pre-Apocalypse[]: Prior to the outbreak, Montanio was fighting in Afghanistan along with the rest of his squad which included a lot of members that would eventually become the Reapers . Upon returning from war, he struggled to find jobs or deal with trauma, but the relationship between him and his comrades remained strong. He then decided to become a mercenary.
Post-Apocalypse[]: During the beginning of the outbreak, as Operation Cobalt was put into action in an attempt to try and contain the undead threat, Pope and a group of his people managed to escape the bombings by running until they reached an abandoned church, where inside Pope was amazed to see none of them had been killed or injured, leading him to view him and his comrades as "the chosen ones". It is unknown if Montanio was present during this revelation. Regardless, he eventually joined the Reapers. At some point, Montanio and his group eventually attacked a group of survivors led by Maggie Rhee despite having no previous hostilities with her group and succeeded in destroying their camp and killing numerous members of her group, causing them to flee to Virginia. He and his group eventually followed them to finish them all off due to his leader, Pope marking Maggie's group. During the hunt for Maggie Rhee and her team, Montanio locates the church where a severely wounded Alden is hiding out. Following a fight, Montanio kills Alden by slitting his throat, but Alden manages to kill the Reaper at the same time. Both men subsequently reanimate. While trying to get Pope to recruit Daryl into the Reapers , Leah mentions that Montanio and Nicholls are still missing since their attack on the Alexandrians and Wardens a couple days prior. After defeating the Reapers , Maggie returns to the church in search of Alden . Upon Maggie entering the church, the zombified Montanio attacks her, but Maggie quickly stabs him in the head and puts him down. To her sorrow, Maggie then discovers and puts down the reanimated Alden.
Death[]: Killed by Alden (Alive) During a fight between himself and Alden, Montanio was able to kill Alden by slitting his throat, but Alden managed to kill him at the same time. He subsequently reanimated. Maggie Rhee (Zombified) After returning for Alden, Maggie encounters and puts down Montanio.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Montanio has killed: Ms. Adams (Possibly) Leo (Possibly) Teresa (Possibly) Alden (Alive) Numerous counts of enemy combatants (Pre-Apocalypse) Possibly unnamed Meridian residents Numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia[]: Montanio is one of seven non-main characters to cause the death of a main character by their own hand, the others being Caesar Martinez , Lilly Chambler , Dawn Lerner , an unnamed Whisperer , Dante , and Bossie .
